CustomField.formula:
CaseNumber + ", " +
IF( AND(CONTAINS(TEXT(CH_Outage__c), "Yes"),OR(CONTAINS(TEXT(Severity__c), "Major"), CONTAINS(TEXT(Severity__c), "Critical"))), "Outage", IF(CONTAINS(TEXT(Severity__c), "Information"), "Info", TEXT(Severity__c))) + ", "
CustomField.label: Subject Email Template First Part
